mapper.insert: insert into goods(category_num, goods_name, goods_price, goods_quantity) value(#{categoryNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsQuantity} )

insert into image(goods_img , goods_detail_img1, goods_detail_img2, goods_detail_img3, goods_detail_img4, goods_detail_img5 ) value (#{goodsImg}, #{goodsDetailImg1}, #{goodsDetailImg2}, #{goodsDetailImg3}, #{goodsDetailImg4}, #{goodsDetailImg5})
mapper.select: select c.category_num, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num where goods_num = #{goodsNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods set category_num = #{categoryNum}, goods_price=#{goodsPrice}, goods_quantity = #{goodsQuantity} where goods_num = #{goodsNum}
